ygData.subject: Poison making
ygData.msgSnippet: Ok..actually there is a NPC rogue who makes poison if you supply the ingridients. After that if you are a rogue all you have to do is apply the poison. 2
ygData.messageBody:
Ok..actually there is a NPC rogue who makes poison if you supply the ingridients.
After that if you are a rogue all you have to do is apply the poison.
2 spider venom sacks
20gp
1 bottle of Crow's brew
I know that there are more recipes in the poison book, but this is the simplest.
Its easy to get it.


Bill Fryman wrote:

> From: Bill Fryman <wef1501@...>
>
> I was informed by a rogue who was taking up pottery(only found one
> who would buy vials, the rest decided they would learn to make their
> own<grumble>) that their aren't any poison recipes using the sealed vial
> yet, so that I shouldn't bother trying to make one. Could anyone confirm this?
>
